/*header*/
.header { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 990; width: 100%; height: 80px; background: #fff; border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e5e5; box-shadow: 1px 1px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); }
.logo { height: 80px; line-height: 80px; font-size: 0; }
.logo a { display: inline-block; }
.logo img { max-height: 100%; }

.nav { margin-left: 24px; }
.nav &gt; ul &gt; li { position: relative; float: left; padding: 0 16px; line-height: 80px; }
.nav &gt; ul &gt; li &gt; a { display: block; font-size: 14px; color: #666; cursor: pointer; }
.nav &gt; ul &gt; li:hover &gt; a, .nav &gt; ul &gt; li.on &gt; a { color: #0075b0; font-weight: bold; }
.nav .down_nav { display: none; position: absolute; top: 100%; left: 50%; width: 150px; margin-left: -74px; padding: 0 18px; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-top: none; background: #fff; box-sizing: border-box; }
.nav .down_nav a { display: block; padding: 20px 0; border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e5e5; font-size: 14px; color: #666; text-align: center; line-height: 1; -webkit-transition: all .5s; transition: all .5s; }
.nav .down_nav a:hover { color: #0075b0; font-weight: bold; }
.nav .down_nav a:last-child { border-bottom: none; }
.nav .in_x { display: none; }

@-webkit-keyframes fade-in { 0% { opacity: 0; }
  100% { opacity: 1; } }

  100% { opacity: 1; } }

/*# sourceMappingURL=style.css.map */
.News .news_x .nx_bottom h5 a.a1{
	background-image: url(../../../About/about/cat_id/129.htm)/*tpa=http://www.coremail.cn/Public/Home/images/icon6.jpg*/;
}
.News .news_x .nx_bottom h5 a.a2{
	background-image: url(../../../About/about/cat_id/129.htm)/*tpa=http://www.coremail.cn/Public/Home/images/icon7.jpg*/;
}
.News .news_x .nx_bottom h5 a.a3{
	background-image: url(../../../About/about/cat_id/129.htm)/*tpa=http://www.coremail.cn/Public/Home/images/icon8.jpg*/;
}
